/musicBot.description: Choose a Share for the musicbot configuration.
/musicBot.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run the musicbot as.
PUID.label: UID to run the musicbot as.

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID.
PGID.label: GID to run the musicbot as.

MusicBot.description: MusicBot is a Discord music bot written in Python. It plays requested songs and if the queue becomes empty it will play through a list of existing songs.
